member.name: T:MKTO.Client.FormTasks.ConfigurationDetail
member.summary: The Form Client Task class inludes a number of form control event handlers in this file. The event can call Form Server Task and Service Server Task.
The Form Client Task class to undertake some specfic tasks for one business object associated to a specified form. It will call Form Server Task and Service Server Task.
